attributes.action: To give  covid relief money to People on legacy Benefits
attributes.additional_details: To give the same amount of covid Relief to those on Legacy Benifits, as people on those benifits are also struggling financially
attributes.background: We think it unfair to give extra money to those on universal Credit however not giving the same amount of money to those on Employment  and Support Allowance and other Legacy benifits.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Extend any Universal Credit uplifts to legacy benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570558

Keep the £20pw Universal Credit lifeline and extend to those on legacy benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572128

ESA claimants to receive same increase as Universal Credit
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570877

Increase ALL unemployed benefits by an extra £20 a week due to Covid-19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566509
